visuals.title: Energy Time Domain
visuals.description: Visual representation for Parseval's Theorem for FT.

traces.y_expr: Array.from({length: 400}, (_, i) => { const t = -4 + i * 8 / 400; return Math.exp(-Math.abs(t)) * Math.cos(2*t); })
